lead_paragraph: PLAYER The Italian Fabio Capello, 61, was only the second non-British coach to take over England’s national team. England has not won a major tournament since playing host to the World Cup ... in 1966. Capello has won league titles with A.C. Milan, Real Madrid, Roma and Juventus (and played for Italy in the 1974 World Cup). He faces the unenviable task of dealing with the ravenous English tabloids.
